html:
Zendesk Tags

Tag Description
battery_testing Getting a battery back to be tested in house
dead_selector Selectors that have no function
bled_bug Blue LED Bug
ghost_power Bike turns on by itself
pedal_assist Bike is not providing assist
front_rack_weld Broken weld
sleeping_battery Battery was left to die
braking_facing Braking were difficult to align on new build
broken_seatpost 2014 seat posts that snap
shipping_damage Tracking FedEx issues
user_error Something was damaged by user/shop
